title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs and mix with grated pecorino.
Drain pasta, mix with pancetta and remove from heat.
Stir in the egg-cheese mixture and season with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken with tikka masala paste for 1 hour.
Add tomato puree and cream, simmer for 10 mins.
Add grilled chicken, cook for another 5 mins.
